details.body:
Get general information about how the tribunal process works.

Employment tribunals public enquiry line

Telephone: 08457 959 775
Minicom: 0845 757 3722
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

The helpline can tell you how make a claim to an employment tribunal but you won’t be able to get legal advice.
